title: Debt
desc:
Post 1275
- Discard 50% of your cards (rounded up) or 4, whichever is the highest.
- You will be in debt for 4 rounds (2 rounds if played after round 7), while in debt, you cannot win the game and will draw 1.5x the number of cards you discarded once the effect ends.
- If you have exactly 0 cards when the effect ends, you will not draw cards and will win, but you will get a darker win role, and it will have a typo.
